summary: "The Incredibles" is a 2004 animated superhero movie by Pixar. In a 1960s-style world, superheroes Mr. Incredible and Elastigirl, now living as a regular family, must hide their powers. When Mr. Incredible helps someone, it pulls their family into a big adventure against an angry fan turned enemy. Director Brad Bird drew inspiration from old comic books and spy movies. The film was a hit, making over $632 million and winning many awards, including an Academy Award for Best Animated Feature. A sequel, "Incredibles 2," came out in 2018.
title: The Incredibles
